title: Nayanam
synopsis:
Nayanam is an urban suspense thriller. Sunayana who is a rich affluent classy woman running a business empire loses her sister who allegedly committed suicide. Now she has two serious jobs finding the truth about her sister Nayana's death and saving herself from a mysterious assailant. Being the prime suspect her husband Harsha runs away in suspicious circumstances. Now she has to rely on two persons who crossed into her life - A professional health caretaker referred by her family doctor to safeguard her at home during her blindness and a career ambitious cop to bust the suspicious serial deaths. Will both of them succeed in saving her from danger? How could she save herself blindfolded, when both of the supposed saviors are helpless due to unexpected events at a crucial time is the core of the film. Produced by LAOS Motion Pictures, Written and Directed by Kranthi Kumar Vadlamudi this urban classic thriller is coming soon in theaters.-
